ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Document status will be changed to Cancelled.Do you want to continue ?')
MlsTrans('Retirement Cannot Be Cancelled, Depreciation Has Exceeded the Document Date')
MlsTrans('Cannot Cancel This Document. This document is related to sales, please cancel the document by canceling the sales process')
MlsTrans('Document Has Been Canceled, Cannot Cancel This Document')

DataViewToText(0, 'DocType,DprArea,DocNum,DocStatus,PostDate,DocDate,AssetDate,DocTotal,Comments', 'Transaction Type,Depriciation Area,Doc No,Status,Posting Date,Document Date,Asset Value Date,Total,Comments', {32768,84},';','',0)

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DocEntry, DocType, DprArea, DocNum, DocStatus, PostDate, DocDate, AssetDate, DocTotal, Comments, ObjType, UserSign, CreateDate, UserSign2, UpdateDate, PIndicator, PeriodCat, Baseref, CancelDate FROM ORTI (NOLOCK) WHERE (DocDate BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2') AND (DocNum LIKE '%'+':3'+'%') AND (DocType = ':4' OR ':4' IS NULL OR ':4' = '') AND (DprArea = ':5' OR ':5' IS NULL OR ':5' = '')

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToText(0,'DprArea,DocNum,DocType,PostDate,DocDate,AssetDate','Depriciation Area,Doc No,Status,Posting Date,Document Date,Asset Value Date',{32768,84},';','',0)

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select MAX(PostPeriod) From ODRN Where PeriodCat = ':1' And Canceled = 'N'
